title: Club I created not showing up
body:
Title. Back when we patched for the new client, after I patched, the club I created is MIA and has been since. When I log onto my smurf, which is in the club, it still shows me as Leader. But on my main account, its no where to be found? Not sure how to fix, ive been reporting the bug for 3-4 months and still nothing. Anyone know a fix?

Club Name: Karma Corp.
Club Tag: Cheza

replies.body: Sometimes those clubs just go a little wonky for some reason. I gave it a good poke on my end so you should be able to see it now!

Thank you thank you thank you! Just out of curiosity, what would have happened if I was at 3 clubs before you did what you did. Would I have had to leave one to get my main back or would I break the system and be in 4 haha

HMMMMMM honestly I'm not entirely sure! I'm willing to bet it wouldn't have let you join another club, since the system still knew you were in the one I needed to poke. It just wasn't showing it on your end.
Well, I was in 3 and thats when I remembered about the club I created and noticed it was gone.
